name: Walkover
description: It is WAR!Team up with your comrades to stand against the pesky aliens.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 600 MHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 8 MB (any supported) Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: >= 32 MB (any supported) Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: We know, that there are problems with some older Intel Graphics drivers. Please have the latest installed.

reviews.review_text: Would recommend if you knew what the hell was going on, but wouldn't recommend if you just shot whatever you saw.                 ps. it runs on windows 98  EDIT: This game reeled me back it was to fun to let go to soon. PSS: this review is not helpful. DA FUQ WHY RATE IT HELPFUL!!?!?!?!?!?!??!!?!? But then again.......... it is confusing.
amazing only needs is a ai unlimted loadout and weapons also units and this game is alien golden lol
This game is really badly designed and boring... no tutorial or info, and just a crappy layout and everything. please dont waste your time
Really did not like the game , too many extra effect.
5 minutes I will never get back.
